Detailed Description

A class responsible for writing on the fifo shared between two processes.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FifoWriter::FifoWriter ( const Fifo &  fifo  )  [explicit]

FifoWriter::~FifoWriter (  )  [virtual]

Closes the file of the fifo.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T >
void FifoWriter::write ( const T &  obj  )  [inline]

Writes an object to the pipe. Note that the object must be of scalar type (or it's internal structure be all scalar types), as it will be written as bytes.

Parameters:
obj The object to be written to the pipe.

size_t FifoWriter::write ( const void *  buffer,
size_t  size 
)

Writes to the fifo.

Parameters:
buffer Data to be written on the fifo.
size The size, in bytes, of the data.
Returns:
The number of bytes written to the fifo. Might be less than size.

void FifoWriter::writeFixedSize ( const void *  buffer,
size_t  size 
)

Writes a given number of bytes to the fifo.

Parameters:
buffer Data to be written on the fifo.
size The size, in bytes, of the data.
